page.title: 03HOUSES
page.content: In this area half the people live in a semi-detatched house. Most have no double glazing with only{6%}having it all over. Surprisingly only{25%}of homes have back gardens and only{21% have a front garden yet{1}home has a swimming pool.{74%}of people said they are happy with their living accomod- ation,{13%}are not and{8%}said it is reasonable. Most think that their living conditions are good but I was not suprised to see only{13%}said that their living conditions are excellent. All the houses are mostly made of brick. Wood is used a lot in old houses, over {81%.}The major roof material is tiles{(70%),}slate being the other.{11%}think the view is very good,{27%}think it is good and for{14% it is alright. The average value of houses is Â£28,000, the highest being Â£56,000 and the lowest being Â£10,000.
